questions.question: How cold ……………………..!
questions.description: In exclamatory structures, the subject goes before the verb.

questions.question: What a lovely smile ………………………..!
questions.description: In exclamatory structures, the subject goes before the verb.

questions.question: How ……………………….. changed!
questions.description: In exclamatory structures, the subject goes before the verb.

questions.question: What …………………………. day!
questions.description: Before an adjective + singular noun we use what a.

questions.question: ………………………….. beautiful weather!
questions.description: We use what before uncountable nouns.

questions.question: …………………………….. wonderful woman she is!
questions.description: We use what a before a singular noun.

questions.question: She is …………………………… kind woman!
questions.description: Before a noun with an adjective, we use such a.

questions.question: You are ……………………….. kind!
questions.description: Before an adjective we use so.

questions.question: Don’t talk …………………………… rubbish.
questions.description: Before an uncountable noun, we use such.

questions.question: They are ……………………………. wonderful hosts!
questions.description: Before an adjective + plural noun, we use such.
